author: A_Brickset_user
title: Slightly over Average
review: I just got this yesterday for 1,99â‚¬.The goal is lacking better details but the mechanism is very nice. Because of this it's playable and goes well with other football sets. There are 2 spare Rubberbands, which are for replacing a broken rubberband.The minifig is nice but the overall set is lacks details. There are even a bit too much big parts, but as a goal it's ok.
